titleStmt.title: St Eustace
IIII. nonas nouembris. passio Sancti eustachii martyris. sociorumque eius

handNote.p: Correcting hand using comma-shaped/caret-like markings, active throughout Julius E VII.

Another later emendor/corrector using a thin pen with nib cut almost to a point and black ink, uses roofed a and very straight-limbed y. Skeat remarks that these emendations are 'late' in his edition's apparatus.

Correcting hand often using double-punctus markings, active only in select items in Julius E VII, described by G.I. Needham, 'Additions and Alterations in Cotton MS. Julius E VII', Review of English Studies, New Series 9 (1958): 160-4.

s.w: o a nƿal g d an
